text: Sphingomonas xinjiangensis is a Gram-negative, aerobic and motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas, which has been isolated from the desert sand of the Xingjiang Province in China.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas xinjiangensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase xinjiangensis Category:Bacteria described in 2011
title: Sphingomonas xinjiangensis
